ags:resource.dc:title: Vplyv pratotechniky na agrochemické vlastnosti kambizeme pod trávnym porastom

dc:title.dcterms:alternative: Effect of pratotechnics on the agrochemical properlies of cambisol under grassland

dc:creator.ags:creatorCorporate: Slovak University of Agriculture, Nitra, Slovak Republic

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: On the grassland (association Lolio--Cynosuretum cristati R. 1937) with brown acidic soil (cambisol) the basic agrochemical attributes (pH, Cox' Nt' P, K) was studied during the years 1986 - 2006. Various systems of management (fertilizing + cutting, liming, no management) had different influences to the cambisol qualities, but had not so significant effect. Between the years there was relatively great variability at the available nutrients values (8 - 75%). The available phosphorus had greatest variability (19 - 96%) and also potassium (18 - 82%). Medium till small variability was characteristic for pH (9 - 14%), Cox (17 - 19%) a Nt (8 - 16 %). The results are indicating that changes of management systems mean not automatically changes of soil features.
